thread.title: Pacquiao breaks Aussie hearts with ‘next fight’ tweet
thread.title_full: Pacquiao breaks Aussie hearts with ‘next fight’ tweet

title: Pacquiao breaks Aussie hearts with ‘next fight’ tweet
text:
Manny Pacquiao announces negotiations with Brit Amir Khan, not Aussie Jeff Horn for ‘next fight’  19pm Source: FOX SPORTS MANNY Pacquiao revealed who he wants his next opponent to be, and unfortunately for Aussie boxing fans, it isn’t Queenslander Jeff Horn. 
Horn was the surprise choice to face ’Pac-Man’ in April, but recent developments put in doubt the blockbuster bout. 
On Thursday afternoon (AEDT), Pacquiao confirmed his team and promoter Bob Arum were in negotiations with British boxer Amir Khan to be his “next fight”. My team and I are in negotiations with Amir Khan for our next fight. Further announcement coming soon. #TeamPacquiao pic.twitter.com/nW5jpmwVJs — Manny Pacquiao (@mannypacquiao) February 23, 2017 
MORE TO COME...
